abstract: The share sale of Companhia Vale do Rio Doce fell short of expectations at 18.4 billion reais ($11.5 billion) as commodities and oil stocks declined.
lead_paragraph: The share sale of Companhia Vale do Rio Doce fell short of expectations at 18.4 billion reais ($11.5 billion) as commodities and oil stocks declined.

headline.main: Vale Share Sale Falls Below Expectations
